column1: Uchi////- The complimentary Peanut Butter Semifreddo came to us as a surprise. Like the super-awesome kind of gift that only comes when your birthday falls on Christmas. Again
column2: it's like peanut butter and apples you ate as a toddler
column3: but maybe it went to college
column5: and eventually earned a B.S. in psych. I almost liked this more than the Fried Milk... Please don't hit me.
